channel.title: Sprites Editor problem...(Can you please help me ?) [HALF SOLVED]
channel.description:
Hello everyone ! :D There is my problem : When I'm using "RSCD Sprite Editor", the software close when I press on "Load Sprite". I tried with apache-ant-1.7.0, apache-ant-1.7.1 and apache-ant-1.8.4 without results... All my paths are working (server is fine too). There is the error I'm getting : [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/w0p8hw.png[/img] run_packer and run_unpacker getting the same problem...but compiler work fine !
@echo off set PATH=C:\RuneScape\apache\apache-ant-1.7.0\bin set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0 ant editor pause
I searched for an hour on forum without solution, just some post without help ! I'm using "EasyRSC" and trying the default "Sprites.rscd". It's seems easy, but sorry, having a hard time. Thanks alot, Maxlam

item.title: Sprites Editor problem...(Can you please help me ?) [HALF SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @Maxlam Maxlam
item.description:
@Maxlam wrote:

-BUMP-

lol. Now in real way; my editor is working fine. But for my “sound problem” (Number 2, down) :

[2 - NOT SOLVED] I will add a new question…I’m trying to put the “Sound” on but my “Config.class” don’t containt an “Member/Sound” stuff…I opened it with “DirtyJoe”. The others posts on forum said to edit it…

[3 - NOT SOLVED] Don’t found where edit the “short” to get more than 255 animations…

Read full topic

item.title: Sprites Editor problem...(Can you please help me ?) [HALF SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @Maxlam Maxlam
item.description:
@Maxlam wrote:

[1 - SOLVED - Updated JAVA to 1.7. Watch down for my second question] I just re-install everything…not working more (Save Image, Clear, Unpack, Overlay and Refresh work…but not Load Sprite, Load Image, Save Sprite).

Well, I don’t think thats the problem, because de client/server are working…Landscape editor work too.
I have to install JavaJRE1.7 after to get Official RSC work.

11tyc5d.png703×211

How you can see, I’m trying
apache-ant-1.7.0 and jdk1.6.0

There is the Log error :

item.title: Sprites Editor problem...(Can you please help me ?) [HALF SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @Maxlam Maxlam
item.description:
@Maxlam wrote:

Hello everyone !

There is my problem : When I’m using “RSCD Sprite Editor”, the software close when I press on “Load Sprite”.
I tried with apache-ant-1.7.0, apache-ant-1.7.1 and apache-ant-1.8.4 without results…
All my paths are working (server is fine too).

There is the error I’m getting :

run_packer and run_unpacker getting the same problem…but compiler work fine !

@echo off set PATH=C:\RuneScape\apache\apache-ant-1.7.0\bin set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0 ant editor pause

I searched for an hour on forum without solution, just some post without help !
I’m using “EasyRSC” and trying the default “Sprites.rscd”.
It’s seems easy, but sorry, having a hard time.

Thanks alot,

Maxlam

Read full topic
item.source: Sprites Editor problem...(Can you please help me ?) [HALF SOLVED]
